The insurgents attacked the base in the village of Metele in northeastern Borno state, the epicentre of a revolt by Boko Haram and its Islamic State splinter group. Clashes add to tension as Nigeria poll nears  Financial Times

With an election just three months away, one of Nigeria’s violent conflicts came to the streets of the capital. Nigerian security forces shot and killed 45 Shia Muslim protesters in and around Abuja last month, according to an Amnesty International investigation.
